before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"epkih","text":"Sample collection and preparation: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cnnq","text":"Seawater was collected in the waters surrounding the Azores Islands as well as in the Ligurian Sea filtered using Sylphium filter capsules with 0.45µm filters. All filters were stored at -20 °C until being shipped or transported to the laboratory at the University of Innsbruck (Austria). Once arriving at the laboratory, filters were again stored at -20 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1qfv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7opgu","text":"Lab work: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83l53","text":"Clean all workbenches with bleach and ethanol prior to use. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"neo5","text":"Thaw all samples. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"14j5f","text":"This DNA extraction protocol is used in Rodriguez et al., 2024 (in prep) for the extraction of environmental DNA from samples collected in the North-East Atlantic and Mediterranean Sea as a part of the eWHALE project. The protocol outlines lysis from both Sylphium (https://sylphium.com/eng/) and Smith-Root (https://www.smith-root.com/) eDNA filters and DNA extraction of lysates using the Qiagen BioSprint® 96 Workstation automated extraction robot +  BioSprint 96 DNA blood Kit (ID: 940057). For further information on this protocol, please refer to Qiagen (2012) BioSprint‱ 96 DNA Handbook. Available via Qiagen: https://www.qiagen.com/us/resources/resourcedetail?id=64902c5d-9c3c-4fe3-a3f7-668c4704d9eb\u0026lang=en","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":617,"length":98}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":266,"length":25},{"key":1,"offset":309,"length":27},{"key":2,"offset":576,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":617,"length":98}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DCE6FBF819AC11EFAE230A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://sylphium.com/eng"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E762DB9019AC11EFAE230A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.smith-root.com"}},"2":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2100390919AD11EFAE230A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2100390919AD11EFAE230A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:","url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/resources/resourcedetail?id=64902c5d-9c3c-4fe3-a3f7-668c4704d9eb\u0026lang=en"}}}}

forks.title: DNA Extraction - Qiagen BioSprint® 96 Workstation using the Biosprint 96 tissue protocol UIBK eWHALE

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"9o098","text":"- Pipettes : monochannel p10, p100, p1000, p5000 and corresponding filter tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j49m","text":"- 1.5 mL and 2 mL microcentrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2s8qe","text":"- 3 mL, 5 mL, or 10 mL syringes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6d57","text":"- Ethanol (96-100%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54d2j","text":"- BioSprint 96 DNA blood Kit (ID: 940057. Qiagen)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59c3j","text":"- Spin columns with silica membrane removed (from this kit ID: 69504, Qiagen)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alr1p","text":"- S-Blocks (ID: 19585, Qiagen)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2h73","text":"- Microplates (ID: 1031656, Qiagen) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"97b8j","text":"Smith-Root Filters","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c88kn","text":"Label 2 mL tube for each    (+ control)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"sample","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"group_guid":"B61E6DAFE498453692417B9AF34350C3","guid":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4kr8q","text":"Remove filter housing from the plastic bag. The yellow half of the filter should be facing the bottom of the bag. Use an Erlenmeyer flask to hold the filter upright while the filter is being opened. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a95rv","text":"Discard the beige filter top. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8o805","text":"Using two pairs of forceps and a pair of scissors, all which have been sterilized by flame 3x each, fold the \"top\" filter paper from each    into a triangle and put it into the corresponding 2 mL reaction tube (tip is at the bottom end). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":138,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"o6ub","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"sample","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"copied":true,"group_guid":"B61E6DAFE498453692417B9AF34350C3","guid":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hitj","text":"Pipette   TES buffer (an alternative to Qiagen DNeasy lysis buffer) and   Proteinase K (total lysis buffer mixture =  ) to all 2 mL reaction tubes, taking care to saturate the filter paper.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":72,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":117,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8g06a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"30qii","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ah8r7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bv65b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"covq4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4hqi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"380","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"al8r4","text":"It's easiest to prepare a mixture of these two liquids for all samples in a falcon tube (always calculate with extra volumes: 1 for negative control, one-two for pipetting errors).","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":false,"entityMap":{},"guid":"5C660DECF3A6465486943B2C64347457"}},"4":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"78no1","text":"  of lysis buffer mixture would suffice.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9ev65","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}},"guid":"AF7AA9DD31224E9BA0C2883D3500CC0B"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ar1de","text":"Vortex filters/turn them upside down a few times. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hgkq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9v2rh","text":"Incubate all 2 mL tubes at   for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eb8gq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"56","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"690n3","text":"Sylphium Filters","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dff0d","text":"Remove from incubator,   briefly to spin down lysate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f98gk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dal4f","text":"Transfer filter into a plastic inlet* and place the inlet + filter back into the original 2 mL tube in which the filter came from. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cj2eg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6juer","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"btrp0","text":"Make sure to remove the silica membrane from the plastic inlet!!!","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"4FC4BA48A5D5469C8B368A13FE0DA902"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"786h","text":" Centrifuge tubes with the 2 mL lid open.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"82bua","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"398su","text":"Throw away the filters from each tube - lysate for extraction remains at the bottom of the 2 mL tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ic8c","text":"Make sure that all filter capsules are labelled and closed properly on the top and bottom. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eacb3","text":"Incubate filters at   for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8io72","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"56","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bu9ks","text":"Use 3 mL to 10 mL syringes (which fit to Luer Locks) to evacuate the lysis buffer from each capsule. Hold the filter vertically, attach syringe to the bottom cap, unscrew the top cap then suck the lysate out. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sg1a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dcleu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fhfgu","text":"Use a new syringe for each filter! ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"7B0EE5FACF764AE6B3E3808F91A90700"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cqgt1","text":"Label 2 mL for each   (+ control)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5t8d4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"sample","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"copied":true,"group_guid":"B61E6DAFE498453692417B9AF34350C3","guid":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu80k","text":"Pipette   of AW1 Buffer into each well of Wash Plate 1 (S-Block). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cftee","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"650","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"k42q","text":"Pipette   of AW1 Buffer into each well of Wash Plate 2 (S-Block). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lnj","text":"Prepare lysate bind plates (for DNA uptake).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn7le","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fp67","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":32}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"de4v1","text":"Each bind plate can accommodate   of lysate. Depending on the amount of lysate in your sample, prepare several bind plates. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"qmes","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}},"guid":"C5DF84B1EB82461E91EE64F2ACA51589"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93ad3","text":"Pipette   AW2 Buffer into each well of Wash Plate 3 (S-Block). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"742c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qtqi","text":"Pipette   AW2 Buffer into each well of Wash Plate 4 (S-Block). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3psu2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23kt0","text":"Pipette   RNase free water (MilliQ water) + Tween 20 (Final concentration of 0.02%) to each well of Wash Plate 5 (Microplate). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dbjvf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"n54k","text":"Pipette   AL Buffer and   Isopropanol to each well in each bind plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5incv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2crqj","text":"Add   MagAttract magnetic particles to each well in the FIRST bind plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1komn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1vvqt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6g8b3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"204f7","text":"Vortex the MagAttract bottle for a few seconds prior to pipetting. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"4FC7B295A0924D31AD807592E46D8C75"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8s9eh","text":"Add   lysate to each of the bind plates. Fill up any missing lysate volume (i.e., not up to   ) with TES buffer (or DNeasy Lysis Buffer). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ckco1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6g0ib","text":"Place a new Rod Cover into the first bind plate. Start the appropriate program on the BioSprint (\"DNA uptake\") according to the number of bind plates (2-7 are available). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q46v","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5rkte","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3to30","text":"At the end of the DNA uptake program, the DNA and Rod Cover will be in the last bind plate. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"BBE967D7CDB14F56B876F2981CF32B72"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1q47t","text":"Using the last bind plate with DNA + Rod Cover as well as the other plates with all reagents, start the \"eDNA extract\" program on the BioSprint. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a44bu","text":"Pipette processed extracts (in the elution plate!) into Eppendorf tubes®","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9j8lm","text":"Carefully dispose of toxic BIoSprint waste into appropriate receptacle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dabkh","text":"Wash all blocks/plates several times with water and subsequently incubate in a bleach-water bath for 1 day. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4al4d","text":"After 1 day, wash the blocks/plates in the dishwasher for reuse. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"94ei8","text":"Pipette   Buffer TE or AE into each well of the Elution Plate (Microplate).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bm9fn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
